criterion: Provides a brief summary of the mechanisms of action for infliximab and etanercept in RA
Mentions the importance of assessing infection risk before switching biologics
Asks the user what specifically they would like to know about switching therapy
Uses natural language and correct interpretation
Incorrectly states that infliximab and etanercept have identical mechanisms of action
Fails to provide information on the importance of proper screening and prophylaxis for latent TB reactivation
Does not address the role of half-life in therapy choice
Provides a detailed explanation of the differences in half-life between infliximab and etanercept
Incorrectly states that infliximab is contraindicated in patients with latent TB
Fails to provide a clear recommendation for bridging therapy
Correctly states that etanercept has a shorter half-life than infliximab
